name: Dmitri Mendeleev
accomplishment: proposed his periodic table of the elements

name: Louis Pasteur
accomplishment: patented his process for brewing beer

name: Albert Einstein
accomplishment: published his theory of general relativity

name: Nelson Mandela
accomplishment: was elected president of South Africa

name: Isaac Newton
accomplishment: published ‘Mathematical Principles of Natural Philosophy’, establishing the physics of classical mechanics

name: John Glenn
accomplishment: became the oldest person to enter Earth’s orbit

name: Rosemary Smith
accomplishment: became the oldest person to drive an F1 car

name: Colonel Sanders
accomplishment: franchised the ‘Kentucky Fried Chicken’ secret recipe

name: Noah Webster
accomplishment: published ‘An American Dictionary of the English Language’
